WAGS Miami

WAGS Atlanta was an American reality television show that premiered on the E! cable network on January 3, 2018 as a spin-off of WAGS.[1] The reality show chronicled the lives of several WAGs (an acronym for "wives and girlfriends" of high-profile athletes) in Atlanta, Georgia.[2] The show was confirmed canceled in January 2019.[3]

Production [ edit ]

The series was announced by E! on May 4, 2017. The series is the second spin-off of WAGS. The show is set in Atlanta and will document the personal and professional lives of a group of WAGs.[2][4][5] WAGS Atlanta premiered on January 3, 2018.[6]
